solution_line_template: Her goal is {hours_per_day} hour a day for {days_per_week} days so on a weekly basis, she exercises {hours_per_day}*{days_per_week} = <<{hours_per_day}*{days_per_week}={weekly_hours}>>{weekly_hours} hours
If she works {weekly_hours} hours a week for {num_weeks} weeks then she exercises {weekly_hours}*{num_weeks} = <<{weekly_hours}*{num_weeks}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours in {num_weeks} weeks
